definitions: Neither parallel nor at right angles to a specified or implied line; slanting.
(of a line, plane figure, or surface) inclined at other than a right angle.
(of a cone, cylinder, etc.) with an axis not perpendicular to the plane of its base.
(especially of a muscle) neither parallel nor perpendicular to the long axis of a body or limb.
Not expressed or done in a direct way.
Denoting any case other than the nominative or vocative.
